description.value:
You spit out a freezing breath or sonic scream. You deal 4d6 damage, plus 1d6 damage for every level you have beyond 6th, to all creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30], with a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save.

@Damage[(-2+@actor.level)d6[untyped]]{Leveled damage}

Awakening Your blast powerfully batters your foes. A creature that critically fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Awakening The kickback of your blast helps you make a speedy escape. When you use this ability, you Fly backward 15 feet in a straight line directly opposite your blast. This movement doesn't trigger reactions based on movement.
